name: BattleRoom (ashleycheung)
description:
Battleroom is a roguelike dungeon crawler game with procedural dungeon generation and infinite levels! 

Includes:

- Split screen multiplayer

- Randomly generated dungeons

- PVP and COOP

- 4 Unique character classes

- 4 Bosses

- 2 terrains

Instructions:

Player 1: wasd to move and 1,2 and 3 to attack, special and pick up weapon

Player 2: up, down, right, left, i, o, p
